data.name: Brookhaven - Supporter Edition II
data.detailed_description:
This DLC was created in part thanks to an overwhelming amount of desire and requests for further support to Brookhaven.

The 'Brookhaven - Supporter Edition II' DLC includes:


  • Bunny outfit for the player. All pieces of the outfit (bunny ears, top, and pants) can be worn separately to mix and match with other outfit combinations.


  • A storage pet. The storage pet provides the player with an extra 24-slots of inventory to bring along on their journey through Brookhaven. It can be commanded to stay/follow whenever necessary, and it does not take the place of a minion so it can be used alongside any summoned minion.


  • New Tameable, the Emu. They can be found in the Unwritten Lands, and once tamed they will drop Bottled Lightening year-round on your farm.

    • New Tameable, the Raccoon. They can be found in the Forest and once tamed they will drop trash and precious gems year-round on your farm.

      Thank you so much for your support!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The 'Brookhaven - Supporter Edition II' DLC includes the Bunny Outfit, ability to tame Emus, and a Storage Pet.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
